deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy

getidentitysource.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for an identity source

getpolicyversion.name: GetPolicyVersion

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for a specific resource

getsession.name: GetSession
getsession.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for an approval session

listapprovalteams.name: ListApprovalTeams
listapprovalteams.description: Grants permission to list approval teams

listidentitysources.name: ListIdentitySources
listidentitysources.description: Grants permission to list identity sources

listresourcepolicies.name: ListResourcePolicies
listresourcepolicies.description: Grants permission to list policies for a resource

listsessions.name: ListSessions
listsessions.description: Grants permission to list approval sessions

startactiveapprovalteamdeletion.description: Grants permission to start the deletion process for an active approval team
